what-is-the-point-of-this.title: What is the point of this?
what-is-the-point-of-this.text: Explaining why I have joined this blog to my portfolio and what its purpose is.
what-is-the-point-of-this.content:
Tersely put, I am building this to bolster three things:

1. My writing  
2. My thinking  
3. My portfolio  

Could this turn out to be a waste of time? Maybe. But as of now, it feels potentially fruitful, and I will continue accordingly.

What is it I intend to write about?

Any thoughts, ideas, or findings I feel are worth sharing and the effort it takes to articulate them. I imagine these will often be philosophically or scientifically themed, but my interests are broad. Notably, I would like to use this as an educational tool; while I realize there is a fair chance nobody will read this, simulating the teaching experience ought to have some benefit, I think.

We will see.

~ T.E
